message.raw: Fixed: Incorrect parameter order fixed on contact merging in Sphere-Trimesh collisions. The bug resulted in merged contact remaining with normal of first contact found. Thanks to Dimitris Papavasiliou for reporting.
message.html: Fixed: Incorrect parameter order fixed on contact merging in Sphere-Trimesh collisions. The bug resulted in merged contact remaining with normal of first contact found. Thanks to Dimitris Papavasiliou for reporting.
